languages.text: {n}Призрачная фигура издает смешок.{/n} "Я слышу столько тщеславия в этих словах. А должен был бы слышать — отчаяние. Или ты, незнаком{mf|ец|ка}, не понял{mf||а} еще? Ты воюешь с океаном, у которого нет конца и края. Сколько бы моих братьев и сестер ни пали — вставших в наши ряды всегда будет больше".

traits.locale_text: {n}Призрачная фигура издает смешок.{/n} "Я слышу столько тщеславия в этих словах. А должен был бы слышать — отчаяние. Или ты, незнаком{mf|ец|ка}, не понял еще? Ты воюешь с океаном, у которого нет конца и края. Сколько бы моих братьев и сестер ни пали — вставших в наши ряды всегда будет больше".

languages.text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."
languages.original_text: {n}Призрачная фигура издает смешок.{/n} "Я слышу столько тщеславия в этих словах. А должен был бы слышать — отчаяние. Или ты, незнаком{mf|ец|ка}, не понял{mf||а} еще? Ты воюешь с океаном, у которого нет конца и края. Сколько бы моих братьев и сестер ни пали — вставших в наши ряды всегда будет больше".

You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

languages.text: {n}幽霊のような人影が笑い声をあげた。{/n}「言葉の中に尊大さが滲み出ているな。代わりに私が聞きたいのは絶望だ。それとも、まだわからないか？あなたは終わりのない海に戦いを挑んでいるのだ。あなたが私のブラザー、シスターを何人傷つけようとも、私たちの仲間はいつでも数で勝っている」
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

traits.locale_text: {n}幽霊のような人影が笑い声をあげた。{/n}「言葉の中に尊大さが滲み出ているな。代わりに私が聞きたいのは絶望だ。それとも、まだわからないか？あなたは終わりのない海に戦いを挑んでいるのだ。あなたが私のブラザー、シスターを何人傷つけようとも、私たちの仲間はいつでも数で勝っている」

languages.text: {n}幽灵般的声音大笑起来。{/n}“你的话语是如此傲慢，我本以为你的语气会充满绝望。或许你还没有意识到吧，陌生人？你面对的是真理信徒的汪洋大海。无论你杀害了我多少兄弟姐妹，总会有更多人加入我们的行列。”
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

traits.locale_text: {n}幽灵般的声音大笑起来。{/n}“你的话语是如此傲慢，我本以为你的语气会充满绝望。或许你还没有意识到吧，陌生人？你面对的是真理信徒的汪洋大海。无论你杀害了我多少兄弟姐妹，总会有更多人加入我们的行列。”

languages.text: {n}La silhouette spectrale éclate de rire.{/n} « Que d'orgueil dans vos propos alors que vous avez tout lieu de sombrer dans le désespoir... À moins bien sûr que vous n'ayez toujours pas compris. Vous livrez bataille contre un océan infini. Peu importe combien de mes frères et sœurs vous abattrez, de nouveaux disciples rejoindront nos rangs toujours plus nombreux. »
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette spectrale éclate de rire.{/n} « Que d'orgueil dans vos propos alors que vous avez tout lieu de sombrer dans le désespoir... À moins bien sûr que vous n'ayez toujours pas compris. Vous livrez bataille contre un océan infini. Peu importe combien de mes frères et sœurs vous abattrez, de nouveaux disciples rejoindront nos rangs toujours plus nombreux. »

languages.text: {n}La espectral figura suelta una risotada.{/n} «Oigo arrogancia en tu voz cuando debería haber desesperación. ¿No te das cuenta, desconocid{mf|o|a}? Da igual a cuantos de mis hermanos mates, siempre habrá aún más que se unan a nuestra causa».
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

traits.locale_text: {n}La espectral figura suelta una risotada.{/n} «Oigo arrogancia en tu voz cuando debería haber desesperación. ¿No te das cuenta, desconocid{mf|o|a}? Da igual a cuantos de mis hermanos mates, siempre habrá aún más que se unan a nuestra causa».

languages.text: {n}Die geisterhafte Gestalt lacht.{/n} "Ich höre großen Hochmut in Euren Worten. Angebrachter wäre Verzweiflung. Oder habt Ihr es noch nicht erkannt, {mf|Fremder|Fremde}? Ihr führt einen Krieg gegen einen endlosen Ozean. Wie viele meiner Brüder und Schwestern Ihr auch niederstreckt, immer mehr werden sich unseren Reihen anschließen."
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die geisterhafte Gestalt lacht.{/n} "Ich höre großen Hochmut in Euren Worten. Angebrachter wäre Verzweiflung. Oder habt Ihr es noch nicht erkannt, {mf|Fremder|Fremde}? Ihr führt einen Krieg gegen einen endlosen Ozean. Wie viele meiner Brüder und Schwestern Ihr auch niederstreckt, immer mehr werden sich unseren Reihen anschließen."

languages.text: {n}Hayaletimsi figür bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Kelimelerinden kibir akıyor ancak yerini çaresizlik almalı. Henüz kavrayamadın mı yabancı? Bitmek bilmez bir okyanusa karşı savaşıyorsun. Kaç kardeşimi kesip biçtiğin fark etmez, saflarımıza katılanların sayısı her daim katlanarak artacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostly figure lets out a laugh.{/n} "I hear such hubris in your words. What I should hear instead is despair. Or haven't you realised it yet, stranger? You are fighting a war against an ocean without end. No matter how many of my brothers and sisters you cut down, those who join our ranks will always be greater in number."

Bitmek bilmez bir okyanusa karşı savaşıyorsun. Kaç kardeşimi kesip biçtiğin fark etmez, saflarımıza katılanların sayısı her daim katlanarak artacaktır."
